website_summaries.verdict: These magnetic locks take the guesswork out of childproofing your cabinets.
pros: Only requires 3M adhesive tape to install the locks
Innovative design ensures the locks can be used in conjunction with most cabinets
Locks can be disengaged using a convenient flip switch
Work great in kitchens, bathrooms, and other rooms
cons: Locks may fall off of cabinets over time
Less durable than many comparable options

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and work great, if you can't tell... someone's angry.
customer_reviews.author: Rommy

customer_reviews.title: I love these now that I have them installed
customer_reviews.text: I love these now that I have them installed... but I wish there was a guide or template to help install. I had to guess where to install on the door and couldn't really get it wrong since we have painted cabinets. The directions are clear, but choosing the location and fit where this would trigger the lock but also be easy to open with the magnet was a little tricky! I'd also love if it came with two magnets for when my husband loses one...but other than that, I would highly recommend. Wish we had done this with all of our cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: SHSTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: If only the magnet didn't get lost...
customer_reviews.text: Installs very easily and works as expected and advertised. But the reality and novelty of the magnet release wore off after the first week when I realized I had to always grab the magnet before opening the door then putting it back in its place. And the first time I had to grab the magnet and it wasn't put back ..... arghhh! I know it doesn't sound like a big deal but when comparing that to simply opening the door and pressing down to unlock I went for a better solution for me
customer_reviews.author: DaleC

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these, just go to Lowe’s
customer_reviews.text: I can not say how terrible these locks are effectively in a review. They’re junk. They would not stay put when atrached; the sticky material doesn’t hold well. If you install slightly off it won’t hook, so you’ll need to unattached and re-stick. By that time the sticky stuff won’t hold again. The magnetic latch on the inside did not pop up on some of mine to be able to lock. Endless frustration. I ended up throwing these, driving an hour to Lowe’s and just buying their standard locks. To be clear, it was not just me who had the issues. My spouse also tried with no luck. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fischler

customer_reviews.title: Video tutorial on how this device works. 5 Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and worked as advertised. I like that the device is behind the cabinet doors so there isnt any plastic showing on the outside. Once installed, you need to use the unlocking knob which is fitted with a magnet to unlock your cabinet doors. The magnetic "unlocking" knob can be conveniently kept at eye level for easy access. Another cool feature is that each lock also comes with an "on/off" switch for when you need to get in and out of the cabinets and don't want to have to keep using unlocking knob.
customer_reviews.author: Independent thinker

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory...
customer_reviews.text: Frustrated. Bought these to deter my 11mnth old opening up all of our cabinets in the kitchen. Well they were worthless. First use tore off the paint on the cabinet, failed instantly. I cleaned the surface before placing the 3m pad & held pressure against the pad for 30 secounds. I think I was more frustrated that the clips didn't work on my style cabinets. Even when the sticky pads held, they didn't actually connect to keep the cabinet shut. Wish there was a screw option, or at least extra sticky pads, in case initial installation doesn't line up.
customer_reviews.author: MrJade

customer_reviews.title: needs work, but EXCELLENT customer service team.
customer_reviews.text: difficult to put up, and magnet doesnt work so well to unlock UPDATE: Natalie personally reached out to me
customer_reviews.author: Snuzz

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced. Exact same product cheaper from other sellers.
customer_reviews.text: After buying these, we decided to try cheaper ones from Enovoe:  It turns out they're identical in every way except for the logo, obviously made by the same manufacturer. Vanguard's look like the same too:  The locks work fine, but save yourself some money and buy the cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Y.M. Horse

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed to have baby locks on some low cabinets that housed some very good china. I looked around and found these!! This is a fantastic product!! I went online to check out the installation, and it was amazing to watch! Well thought out with the magnet that is kept in the holder until needed. Also, has the ability to override the lock as well!
customer_reviews.author: Motor City Madman

customer_reviews.title: Weak adhesive, difficult to align
customer_reviews.text: These are so hard to install for two reasons: One, you have to line the catch up PERFECTLY so that it is just where the hook will catch it. It took so long for me to correctly align them to just four cabinet doors. Secondly, the adhesive is insufficient. I've had to reattach each part (all four locks and all four catches) with superglue, because they all came off. I will say, after the great effort I've been through to make these work, I'm enjoying them now, but I also live with a little bit of concern that they are going to break off again. They have some serious issues to work out...
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to childproof our cabinets from our ever so inquisitive 14 month old toddler. Love that you cannot see these on the outside, avoiding looking tacky. The adhesive works well and so does the device itself, as our 14 month old cannot get into cabinets. Installation was easy EXCEPT it was very difficult to get the sticker off the adhesive - had to use tweezers with multiple attempts. May need to leave more of a lip on the adhesive sticker to be able to pull it off easier. This was my only reason for 4 starts instead of 5. Otherwise love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley & Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Renters
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these cabinet locks for our bathroom vanity that has one cabinet door and three drawers because the drawers are too close together for traditional cabinet locks that we have in the kitchen. I didn't know that they aren't meant for drawers but they do work for ours. I will say that the cabinet door one does open more easily than the drawers so I can see that they are meant more for the cabinets. I personally wouldn't want to have to use a magnet to unlock each cabinet in my kitchen but for those who rent or don't want to use a drill to install other locks, I would think these would be a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install with the jig
customer_reviews.text: I am trying this type of lock because the 3yr old child is smart and may figure out how to undo other types of locks soon. So, I am hoping the glue is strong over time and the magnet stays strong over time. The installation jig is clever. The instructions don't tell you to make sure there will be contact for the piece that fits on the door when you close it to engage the glue. So, I had to eyeball that. I thought about using double-sided tape on that piece before peeling off the cover to their sticky pad, but my eyes are pretty good (and it worked).
customer_reviews.author: Old300 Guy

customer_reviews.title: Jambini made some improvements
customer_reviews.text: We've been buying these locks as needed over the past year and in the latest set they now include an install tool that makes installation VERY easy. I wish that had been a thing a 36 cabinets ago. My main complaint had been the adhesive pads weren't the strongest but that's not to say they were bad, there are certainly weaker ones (had tried other brands but switched to Jambini after they fell off)... but now this "2nd edition" I'll call it comes with even stronger adhesive pads. I think the only room for improvement at this point would be stronger magnets. On extra thick cabinets I've had to use 3rd party magnets as keys to get them to work.
customer_reviews.author: dartNet

customer_reviews.title: Great child safety device
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a while for something that I could use to lock my cabinets so my midnight snacker would actually sleep at night and from the second they discovered the cabinets were locked, it's been heaven. If you were to pull with enough force, I'd imagine these would break. But for my purpose, I highly doubt that will happen. I was a little disappointed that I couldn't fit these on all of my cabinet drawers, but that was no flaw of this product rather it was the way the cabinets were designed, there is no room for these to work.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and they work
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time purchasing child proof cabinet locks. The other styles I purchased before are the type that are visible on the outside of the cabinet. These are very easy to install. At first I didn't read the directions all the way through and thought they were missing pieces but then I realized they give you one "holder" which you use to install all the locks in place on the cabinet frame and the door at the same time. The cabinets I installed these on has a very thick wood frame, but the magnet still works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Cats have been thwarted!
customer_reviews.text: I have two mischievous cats who LOVE to get under the sink and hang out. I bought these to keep them out, and they work perfectly. (Definitely better than the gallon of water I had standing guard for a week.) These don't require nails or screws (I live in an apartment and needed a temporary solution). They were easy to affix and even when I had to move them, they came off without ruining the cabinet's finish. No more under the sink adventures. Immensely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: historicalsloveme22

customer_reviews.title: Not convenient but cabinets do remain closed
customer_reviews.text: Husband installed very easily. But I'm lucky because he's good with his hands. We have these on 3 cabinets. Works okay on 2 of the 3 cabinets, but the one for some reason gives me a hard time. I have got to say it is a little annoying while cooking to reach over, grab the magnet, then bend down, remember where the magnet is on the other side, then open the cabinet. This product is not convenient, but with that said, I still keep them on my cabinets to keep my daughter's fingers from being hurt because they do remain completely shut; and my daughter's safety is more important than my convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie's True Review

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage, cheap plastic parts
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Purchased this to secure cabinets behind the bar. Upon opening the package, could immediately tell these were made of cheap plastic and would not be very durable. Instructions were in tiny print, with very small pictures, which made installation difficult. Closers failed to “catch”, even after adjusting. When I manually got them to “catch”, then the “magnet” failed to unlock them. Two of the four broke upon installation. Cheap plastic parts, easily breakable. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my kitchen cabinet under the sink and my spice rack. My toddler hasnt been too curious anymore about opening up these cabinets but I have an 8 month old who’s quickly learning and pickup up after big brother. So in no time she will be exploring the kitchen and I will not need to worry about her getting in to things when I have my eyes off her for a split second. Super easy to install and use. I know there are many selections out there but these will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Diem T

customer_reviews.title: These work great on cabinets with a "lip"!
customer_reviews.text: We had originally purchased a different brand that had great reviews too but they didn't fit our cabinets due to the lip. (See picture) After doing more research we came across these. They work great so far and were easy to install. The company has great communication. We received emails from the co-founder making sure we received everything and were satisfied. I would highly recommend! ***Update*** Excellent customer service!!! I needed only one more lock to have all my cupboards secure and they are sending it to me. Fantastic customer service and prompt response to my email!
customer_reviews.author: SavedbyGrace

customer_reviews.title: I have 11 sets, love them
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for nearly four years, two kids and another on the way. They stick great, none of them have come off unless I take them off, toddlers yanking on the doors as hard as they can have never opened any of them. Can be locked open, didn't initially realize that this would be a great feature, but over the years we have moved stuff around so some cabinet doors that were originally locked are now open, but the lock is still there if we need it. Comes with extra sticky backings, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quailty product...Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two sets of these and they work exactly as described. Was able to install ten locks in our kitchen in about an hour without any issues. The 3M adhesive is really quite strong, and the magnetic functionality is pretty slick. Some of our kitchen drawers are a little over an inch thick and the magnet mechanism was just fine with them. Overall, really great product. We plan to order more for the bathrooms in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible child protection.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 16 of these based of the great reviews on amazon. Installed them on a bunch of ikea drawers and less that half of them work. Some drawers my 13 month old simply pulled the drawer out and the 3M tape failed after being afixed for several days. And others haven’t worked from the start despite careful positioning. The locking clips just slides right over the catch without catching. This product is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Architect

customer_reviews.title: A win for my cabinets!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I bought them because the clamps were using does not fit with the cabinets we have in the apartment. I was really looking for long clamps and stumbled upon these magnetic locks. I was skeptical but I decided to try it because of the positive reviews and videos I saw. Arrived quickly and it took probably less than 15 minutes to install. They are perfect and now I don’t have to look at those stupid clamps anymore. HIGHLY RATED!! If your little one isn’t crying over this then something is wrong
customer_reviews.author: Karen Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best cabinet lock product we have tried so far..
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several products to secure our cabinets and this is the best and most innovative. We used one lock beneath our kitchen sink and the others on a couple kitchen drawers to prevent our toddler from accessing sharp objects. We keep the lock on the fridge which is, in our case, a few steps from the kitchen cabinets and drawers. Install was super easy. Once you figure out how the magnet will release the latch, it all make sense. I did actually contact customer support about a question and they were very responsive and super easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: buff-smartbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever, what a waste. I set this up on a Friday night because were going out of town that weekend so I figured it would be enough time everything to set. On Monday I put my son down to crawl and adventure on when we got home. We were not even settled in completely when my son pulls on the TV stand doors and the locks just snap off. I used the extra one they included and tried it again. We made sure to keep our son away for 2 days again. The moment we let him adventure on in the living room, he pulled on the door and off it came. Such a waste :(
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Great once you get it on
customer_reviews.text: It took me a minute to figure out the proper placement and I had to pull it off a couple times and adjust it but once I got it in place it was fantastic. I was using it on antique Furnature that the locks broke and I wanted to keep shut but didn’t want something tacky you could see. I also have a third child on the way and I will definitely be getting more. These are the best child locks I have seen and I have seen lots with my first two. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted these to work so bad....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. I got them up and actually waited 24 hours before I locked them so the adhesive had time to adhere. First thing our 1 year old walked over grabbed the cabinet handle pulled with little effort and popped the first right off. The came our 2 year old twins who pulled open the rest of them. I am sad as the idea is great, we have had the drill in magnetic locks which take way more effort but work great. I think this product should give the consumer the option to use a glue to make them more permanen, I would be willing to try them again with a glue. I did return them.
customer_reviews.author: Virtuality

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second attempt at ordering magnetic cabinet locks (the first company was terrible) so I was nervous, but these are fabulous! The locks were all easy to install and good quality, I got all 4 set up by myself in under 10min. The only reason I gave 4 and not 5 stars is one of the locks isn’t quite right, when the magnet unlocks it it stays unlatched and you have to manually reenagage the lock before you close the cabinet. But it’s a minor issue and overall these are great, I will get more to do my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia T

customer_reviews.title: Even better than before
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering a set of these-we recently moved and wanted a fresh set for the new house. They’re somehow even better than before-new features include better adhesive and an installation tool so you don’t have to guess at the right placement to align the pieces. Perfect for keeping the toddler out of cleaning supplies with making our kitchen look ugly. Never had a problem with the kid being able to yank the door open-it’s secure and she learned quickly that the door won’t do anything if she pulls on it. Completely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: k.meyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I bought a ton of stuff from buy buy baby and returned it. This magnetic and adhesion cupboard locking stuff is the best. The baby pulls on it and the cupboard will not open without the magnet key. Just sit on the kitchen floor and read the instructions, you will get this right. if it doesn't latch when you first put it on, pull very hard and remove the adhered piece, move it slightly forward about a millimeter, push firm to adhere and it will re-stick and still stay put.
customer_reviews.author: BuilderGirl

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is great, the customer service after purchase was fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Okay, bought these at the end of December and our daughter just began to really get into hazardous areas that require some type of lock. The packaging is great, the customer service after purchase was fantastic, we got several follow-up e-mails after purchase to ensure our satisfaction, sadly I couldn't provide feedback at the time. However, now that we are trying to use these locks we've been greatly disappointed to learn that the double sided tape that is provided does not stick very well and cannot properly hold the locking device in place. Good idea, poor design, great people. Sadly, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid cant manipulate it like other kind i bought
customer_reviews.text: So far impressed with it install was a breeze compared to the other well name brand that frustrated me, also bought the ones the go around nobs kid defeated that one on day 2. Update ordered 3 more to finish off the kitchen area loved them so much, they work on my thicker cabinet doors, with close proximity to the knob(tested before I did final install) also has a "on and off" switch for lack of better word so it can be deatcivated
customer_reviews.author: AuntiePeppercorn

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two sets of these locks about 18 months to two years apart. The first set was used to keep my autistic child out of my bookshelf--an IKEA Billy with thick glass and wood doors-- and they are still going strong. The second set is being used to keep him out of a pair of IKEA Ivar cabinets with solid pine doors. My child is an extremely strong 6 year old, and the locks have worked really well to keep my things safe thus far. I don't think they will be strong enough to stop him in a year or two, but they would definitely be more than sufficient to keep out a determined toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on these they are garbage. Went straight in the trash after one day. My two year old barely had to try to open a cabinet and the whole lock fell apart.You can not return these. I have been a customer of Amazon for years and this is the worse purchase I have made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cradle

customer_reviews.title: A good option
customer_reviews.text: We found the adhesive didn't stick to our oak cabinets quite as well as we hoped on a few particular drawers/doors (after cleaning and drying the surfaces). And the latch on one of them we bought got stuck in the down position even though we hadn't locked it - you can flip a little lever underneath to keep it from latching. The rest of them worked well. Our biggest concern was that our one year old would find a way to get to the chemicals under our sink, but these did their job and he went from curious to ignoring very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: These cabinet locks are the best! They’re super easy to install, don’t ruin your cabinets and keep the little ones out! My sister had these in her house when my niece was in early toddler stages and I t ugh ought they were terrific. Now that I have my own toddler I had to get these locks for my home. They’re reasonably priced, easy to use and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Paulis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay stuck
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I’ve had these installed a little over two weeks and I’m pretty disappointed. They don’t stay stuck to the cabinet. And yes, I did allow them to set for a full 24-hours. Within 20 minutes of closing them, to have them latch after the 24-hour set time, they began becoming unstuck and falling off. Sorry I bought two packs. Major disappointment. Going to see if I can find a better adhesive bc the locks do function for lock purposes but you can get the darn thing to stay stuck to the cabinets what good does it do?
customer_reviews.author: Shopper A

customer_reviews.title: No lie best locks ever
customer_reviews.text: I have soft close cabinets and the other types of locks would hit the inside part of the "lock" and since the doors closed super slow the doors would just stay open unless you pushed them closed. With these locks the doors shut just fine like a feather. I only wish when you placed the lock on the outside of the door it would stick. You have to hold the magnet up as you open the door. Still 5 stars because no other lock works this well ( That I know of in my small world ).
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: nice looking and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The installation is pretty easy and it holds strong enough for my 8mo not able to open. Why not 5 stars? There was not a clear mention in the instruction of how deep the lock should be placed. So I ended up with a locker locked and not opening by magnetic key. The glue was not firm yet, so I was able to detach it and move it closer to the edge. Now it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan P

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install Child Locks
customer_reviews.text: I like the use of magnets to attach the locks. Installation was a breeze with the installation tool and self-sticking locks. Just line them up and stick. No screwing. Great for apartment people--no holes. For small children, this system works great. Because they are not screwed into the cabinet, it is possible that an older child could open the door with brute force. But then again, a child of this age should be aware of the dangers in that cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Works well; try this if you have a stuck one
customer_reviews.text: These work well. We had one that didn’t seem to work (the lock part didn’t pop up even when it was supposedly engaged), and we got a replacement. Turns out that the screw on the handle pull on the door we were installing it on was magnetized and the lock was too close to it. So we moved it over and now everything is working. If you have one that seems as though it is stuck down, that’s something to try.
customer_reviews.author: Abby OH

customer_reviews.title: Great for ferret proofing!
customer_reviews.text: I own ferrets and these cabinet locks keep the little rascals out of my kitchen cabinets. The magnet functions perfectly to unlock even on thick doors. I am renting so the adhesive mounting for these locks works great and would take a significant amount of force to pry open. The feature that surprised me the most was the ability to lock them open. This is great because when you don't have to worry about kids (or ferrets) getting into cabinets you don't have to unlock them every time you want to use them! I absolutely recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Luke K.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, that was easy!
customer_reviews.text: The package even came with a template plastic piece to hold the lock and block in place as you stick it onto the cabinet!! Given the numerous cabinets in my kitchen, now I need to go buy more. I love how these are invisible and also fairly low profile so it doesn't interfere with the look of the outside or the ability to pull things from inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good design.  Not just any magnet for a key.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy install, smooth lock and unlock. Automatically relocks every time the door closes - if this is annoying it has a switch to remain unlocked permanently until you are ready for it to be in auto lock again. Get extra keys - not just any magnet will work because the locking mechanism is not a piece of metal but rather another magnet with a spring. Thus the key has to have the north/south magnetic fields lined up properly and of the correct "size" and "shape" to work well. Any strong magnet will have an affect on the lock, but may or may not open it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, love the option of locking them open, magnet not great
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how easy these locks are install, especially with the handy installation tool. I also like being able to leave them locked open, which works great so you can install them early than needed. The magnet strength seems to weaken over time, especially when attached to the holder. It was so weak that it was hard to open one slightly thicker door. But overall, I think this is a very good product and should last for as long as needed.
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic cabinet locks
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased these magnetic cabinet locks and I was skeptical thinking another purchase through amazon but have to admit it is well worth the purchase. My 1 yr old would constantly open and close cabinets getting into cleaning products or anything in sight. Since installing the magnetic cabinet locks my 1 yr old has no interest in playing with the cabinets. I highly recommend this locking mechanism for your determined cabinet Smith . This product is very easy to use once installed. I place the magnetic lock on my fridge for easy access and grab and go to release cabinet doors. Thanks for a great product. Ray
customer_reviews.author: Ramos

customer_reviews.title: It works okay. Wish we went with something else.
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet locks are fairly easy to install. It does keep the kid out of the cabinet and I like that there’s no screws needed. But approx 20% of the locks (we have it on about 25 cabinets throughout the house) won’t stay locked. You have to slam the cabinet door for it to lock. For some reason I can’t get the latch to remain in the locked position. It just seems to want to stay down. Now I just wish I had purchased the manual locks where you would have to push the lever down to open the cabinet all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Irene M

customer_reviews.title: These are great locks. I have some sneaky kitties who were ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great locks. I have some sneaky kitties who were getting into the cabinets and stealing crouton bags, chip bags, treat bags... sigh. I put these on and they can no longer take those things out, plus it’s easy for people to open quickly. I keep our magnet on the fridge so it’s right there whenever I need to open a cabinet. I also like that you can move the latch so it stays unlocked if you plan on going in and out of the cabinet a lot, like when you’re cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Great product but be careful with placement make sure you place in proper place and also make sure your cabinets wont be too thick! Mine are aaaalmost too thick so I had to perfectly align them for placement for them to work. I find that one of the cabinet sticks but I think that's my own fault cause it was the first one I set ip
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to prevent entry into several areas that held items that could be harmful for children. Everything works great and I am overall pleased with this purchase. I did take away a star because it takes a little effort and trial and error to get them to adhere properly to the cabinet door. You must make sure that adhesive surface "C" comes out far enough to reach the cabinet door or all is for not.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Invisible and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Of three other cabinet locking methods we've tried, this is the most convenient and attractive design. Just make sure that when you install them that theres plenty of room for the hook to engage. On the first few I installed I put it just a hair too deep into the cabinet and really had to push the cabinet closed hard to get it to engage and also to unlock but on the rest I brought it a little closer and it engages and unlocks effortlessly. The magnetic sticky pad is really useful to stick the key on a wall close to the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Slater

customer_reviews.title: Houdini stymied!
customer_reviews.text: These locks were bought to prevent my Houdini cat from exploring & leading her brother into unsafe places. She's very smart & has been able to defeat other baby locks. So far, she's been completely stymied by the magnetic cabinet locks.
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly (90% of the time)
customer_reviews.text: I love these! they work great on all our cabinets except for our kitchen cabinet doors, which of course are the most important. it must be too humid or something, because the adhesive squares will NOT stick to the door or frame of our kitchen sink cabinets. otherwise, they are great and work as expected ! love that they are hidden. i wish we could order extra opening magnets without getting another set, though.
customer_reviews.author: quintette

customer_reviews.title: A child lock that works
customer_reviews.text: My family has tried many different child proofing locks and the ones that require you to solve a puzzle (push a lever, slide something over, pinch something, etc.) just seems to be a challenge to our kids to solve them because they always figure them out. These magnetic locks are simple to figure out but you can hide the magnet so they can’t open the doors even if they know how. Also, the magnets required to open the doors are fairly strong so basic refrigerator magnets won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: chips5ahoy

customer_reviews.title: Will keep even the most persistent toddler out!
customer_reviews.text: These locks are so much better than the kind you push down! My toddler gives it a few pulls and realizes he can’t open the drawer and gives up. The adhesive is strong, no screwing into the wood necessary. I love that I can keep my cabinets looking beautiful while keeping my babies safe! Just don’t lose the magnet!
customer_reviews.author: Dl3arnes

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly helpful for a tricky pantry door.
customer_reviews.text: Because of the current health crisis, I am working from home with my two little kids (husband is still going in to work). I have the typical child-safety locks in place on many cabinets (which require screws and holes) but those wouldn't work on my pantry cabinet. Took a chance and bought a set of Jambinis - now my 2 year old thinks the cabinet is broken because she can't get it open. Win for me! I don't have to put back all of my non-perishables 50 times a day. Highly recommend and will likely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Cait B

customer_reviews.title: Warning !
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved these because they are so discreet and don't need holes. I bought 3 sets! However, after a couple weeks, I dropped the magnetic "key" and it broke apart with the tiny magnet falling right out! This happened several times now that I had to update my review. As most people with kids know, magnets are very dangerous if a baby were to eat them, so I was extremely disappointed that it was so easy for it to come apart. Beware that this baby proofing "solution" can also be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible product. It comes with a not helpful one sheet with installation instructions that are impossible to follow. But the real problem is that it can't be installed unless your cabinet is one slim door with no instruction at the top. My cabinet has a wood runner on the inside and there is no clearance for this product. The description needs to be updated to explicitly stated how much clearance is needed for installing. Lastly, the tape won't hold, that is clear as day. DON'T bother with this!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzman1111

customer_reviews.title: Only works on double-door cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I sent a message directly to Jambini - their packaging claims to offer a 30-day money back refund if you’re not happy with the product - but I didn’t receive a response. I purchased these locks for a few sets of non-double doors (as in not the dual cabinets under the sink) and they did not work. The adhesive was difficult to apply blind and I could not get them to stick/work without the advantage of having the second door open to adjust the lock.
customer_reviews.author: hollygonightly

customer_reviews.title: New Brand, New Packaging, Same Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item when it was Safety Baby and as other reviewers have mentioned it came packages very nicely with extra adhesive and felt more premium. I was skeptical when I got the item this time around as the brand had changed and the packaging felt cheap leading me to believe it was knock off. Decided to give it a try and these are the same high quality items I have on other cabinets. It now includes a bonus mounting tool to ensure perfect alignment which did not come with previous purchase. Overall great quality and strongly recommend. Our previous locks have stood the test of time and kept the young ones out.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Don't even know they're there
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 sets with our first son 2-1/2 years ago, and they still work like a charm. We just ordered some more now that we have a second mobile toddler. I love that they are out of sight - you don't even know they're installed. No drilling necessary either. Also, if you need to frequently access a cabinet, you can simply 'disable' the lock by pressing the latch down. Just pop it back up when you need it to lock again. We keep two keys under our upper kitchen cabinets, way out of reach from the children. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for pets too!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I have a cat that's too curious for her own good. They were easy to install and had the desired effect immediately. My cat could not open the cabinet doors and after trying for a half hour stalked off to pout. I would purchase these again! Not only are they great for small children, but curious pets can be protected from the same dangers that children might encounter with curiosity. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Kasper

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the older styles available!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the older styles available! Purchased these for our pesky/persistent cat— no more late night adventures under the kitchen sink! The installation took a little adjusting (inside piece had to be moved a tad outward) to be sure the lock didn’t grab so tight it was difficult to unlock, but love them otherwise. Initially thought the cabinet door was too thick for the magnet, but all worked great once adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Michelle

customer_reviews.title: We will see... **UPDATE**
customer_reviews.text: 1 didn’t stick so I hope they will replace. Seem very well made, hoping customer service will make good on a nearly $5 portion... more to follow after customer service responds... and they did **UPDATE**Great item. Better than any of the others for a variety of reasons. Most importantly, the catch. Not too long or bulky like the others. Well made. Had one that didn't work correctly and the owner/company was superb on communication and replaced it right away. Have since purchased more. Worth the money by far, goes on very well, no banged knuckles or damaged cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: JustUsInNOVA

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: These seem very sturdy and affixed with the 3M brand adhesive, and strong magnets to boot. We use these for earth quake preparedness, just to be safe. We use these daily for that reason on all our heavy ware cabinets. So far these work well and give us some peace of mind. There is a nice feature where one can disable the locks too if having a busy cooking task and need lots of quick cabinet access. I ordered extra fobs and have them posted out of sight all over kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Jag

customer_reviews.title: Invisible function, simple install, strong performance
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Once you get a template for where you want them installed the same on each door, the install process is fast & simple. The adhesive installation (no drilling) and near-invisible appearance, are bigger positives than the downside of having to grab the key (magnet) to open the cabinet door. Our infant is getting strong enough to try yanking the doors open but these are holding strong (supervision is of course the best policy).
customer_reviews.author: Nbot

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just two notes before install
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Just two things. 1). Make sure hinges/cupboard doors are just where you want them and wait a bit before install. We put them on an Ikea cupboard just after some hinge adjustments. Think the cupboard doors must need awhile to settle before installation as it sometimes has issues latching upon closure. Other installations have been great! 2). Takes awhile to know where to use the magnet if you don't have hardware as a point of reference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hidden Locks
customer_reviews.text: My second son is especially curious. I needed something to keep him out of the cabinets, but I didn’t want the locks to show. These locks are hidden, and you use a magnet to open then. The best feature is that you can leave them unlocked by flipping a tab down. They were super easy to install and did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer De Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Gives parents a sense of calm.
customer_reviews.text: It took a few minutes to understand how this works but once we did it was a cinch. This is exactly what we were looking for due to our child trying to open every cabinet. We have a sense of calm thanks to this great product! Easy to install and high quality at a great price . Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S. Eliasof

customer_reviews.title: Excellent child safety locks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design works great. Easy to install with included alignment tool. I used 3M clear film between the locks and the cabinets for easier removal without damage. The included VHB tape is extremely strong. They do have a lever that allows you to keep them unlocked, so I guess there really is no need to ever remove.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mestemaker

customer_reviews.title: Discreet and Helpful for Some Cabinets
customer_reviews.text: We live in a rental, so I was hesitant to install locks that required screws, drilling, or possibly defacing the front of cabinets. These fit the bill! However, over time, our toddler was rough on some of our cabinets, and if these weren't installed with no wiggle room, she could move the cabinet door back and forth enough and forcefully enough to dislodge the locks. These can be tricky to install with some cabinets, and they didn't work on our bedroom suite because the drawer fronts were too thick for the magnet to work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: These locks are well made and I like that they don't come with a generic adhesive but ...
customer_reviews.text: These locks are well made and I like that they don't come with a generic adhesive but the 3M brand instead. The only thing is that it only comes with one key for unlocking and I worry I might lose it. Is there a way to purchase another? The package comes with 4. The installation is easy and doesn't require screwing anything into your cabinets. I need to purchase more because we have a ton of cabinets but I waited to see the quality first. My toddler is going to be so mad. lol
customer_reviews.author: Hbmathey

customer_reviews.title: Cool locks and easy to install but one broke during ...
customer_reviews.text: Cool locks and easy to install but one broke during installation and another was defective. Make sure the lock mechanism clicks in and out of place before installing. The lock piece broke pretty easily because it was installed too high on the cabinet. I was very gentle when opening and closing the cabinet door to test the lock. We will buy more because my husband is in love with any product using 3m and so we can have the same locks throughout the house.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Jambini-because you should!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, once you master the technique to install them it is easy-peasy. They are invisible on our brand new kitchen cabinets, which we love. Our 20 month old grandson cannot open them (believe us he tries!) and has not yet figured out our secret!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Great cabinet safety product!
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well as designed. I have not had any problems with the mechanism, only don’t lose the latch release. The adhesive is not quite as good as I’d like, but is generally adequate. Making sure people don’t pull on it without releasing the latch helps preserve the adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Lajos214

customer_reviews.title: we were fortunate to have a strong school magnet that worked
customer_reviews.text: A lifesaver! Keeps my toddler out of my cupboards and you can't even tell they are there from the outside. My only suggestions would be to include a second magnet in the package...my daughter accidentally locked the magnet in the cupboard...we were fortunate to have a strong school magnet that worked. Otherwise I would have been heading to the hardware store to get my cupboard open again! Easy to install, but take the time to measure correctly!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Some issues
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but not sure about it yet. The installation tool is great for alignment but two of four latches are sticking in the disengaged position even when /unlocked/ from that function. They are stuck like that and only engage if we slam the cabinet door - not a habit we are trying to teach :).
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: 2 worked, 2 were broken.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 4 pack. 2 worked great, the other two fell apart uipon pulling them out of the box and I wasn't able to get them to secure. Very dissaoointed and would not recommend until quality control improves. Also, no way to refund for some these reason. Have refunded many other defective items in the past with no issues. Bought these on October 29th and they arrive today (Nov 1st).
customer_reviews.author: Ahoward

customer_reviews.title: Follow the directions and it's easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great! My little grandson will be safer and my cabinets still look good! WIN-WIN! This is a fantastic design as we can activate when needed or leave deactivated when not needed. My painful hands had no problem with installation, just follow the easy step by step directions.
customer_reviews.author: rivergirl

customer_reviews.title: Great price & great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These cabinet locks were VERY easy to install, and are good quality. I'm very satisfied with the price, too, considering the product I received. The instruction card that came in the box was a little confusing, but a search on youtube for installation instructions showed me how to do it. No tools, no drilling or screwing anything into your nice cabinetry - just some great 3M tape to keep the locking mechanisms in place. The box included 2 keys, 8 locking mechanisms, and some extra tape pieces (if you needed them). The latches work very well and have done a good job of keeping my toddler out of the kitchen and bathroom cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine V.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage and a rip off
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this garbage. I ordered 8 of them at the price of $30. Half didn’t stick to my cabinets. The other half my one year old broke off ASAP pulling the doors. Two of them worked. Ok great, I secured a single cabinet. One month later the magnet stops working. I purchased cheap sliding locks that go on the outside of the cabinet and guess what - no issues. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Yellsy

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: Idea is great. We didn't want to ruin our cabinets, so we decided to try out these locks. They seemed like a good option. However they do not work. We have tried them on different types of cabinets. The magnet is just not strong enough to be able to open the door. So every time we tried opening it we ended up ripping the lock off. It didn't work even once. The most upsetting thing is that for some reason they wouldn't even let us return the item. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Goce P.

customer_reviews.title: Great if you understand your drawer mechanics!
customer_reviews.text: These locks are easy to install IF you understand the mechanics and materials of the cabinet or drawer you’re using. I ended up losing one of the set I bought because I affixed the first part of the lock to the porous underside of our vanity top — which was not the right location (drawer wouldn’t close) and then it wouldn’t stick to the right spot. Wish there were a way to test out a pot bonfire involving the adhesive. But if you know what you’re doing/where you’re putting it, the alignment tool is pretty effective/idiot proof.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: So far great product
customer_reviews.text: At first I had figure out where the locks should go to work best but after figuring out where and how to install the magnetic locks I was quickly able to get all of them installed! You should have seen my child’s face the next day when trying to open the chip cabinet ( is it bad that it made me giggle??) lol
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended because of the weak key
customer_reviews.text: This product is a joke. It's easy to install, it sticks super well and the magnetic key is too WEAK to unlock it! I had to use a very thin wire to get into drawer’s crack and unlock it manually. Be careful when you think about buying it. If your cabinet or drawer is thicker than 2’. It will NOT work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hui Li

customer_reviews.title: Two already broken
customer_reviews.text: Two of the locking mechanisms have broken, so I'm rating durability low. It only had minimal use, so I'd suggest trying a different brand if it's in a high traffic location like a kitchen. Since it's been over a month, Amazon doesn't allow a return (and two of the locks are being used, so I'd have to rip them off my cabinets in order to return all 4.) Bottom line - try a different company that creates a similar product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer N.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best lock. Tape is weak.
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive is weak. I allowed to set for a full day and my 1 year old toddler ripped all 4 locks right off the cabinets. While I can appreciate trying to prevent using screws, if you have a small child who had any sort of motivation to open a door, they can rip these off the walls easy. Back to screws I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my snoopy toddlers from opening our cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these locks for our kitchen and bathroom cabinets. They work so well! Haven’t had any issues with them at all. They are a bit difficult to install at first. But once you get the hang of it, it’s a breeze. Would recommend for anyone trying to keep their curious babies and toddlers safe.
customer_reviews.author: Mika

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.text: These locks are amazing. They took about 5-10 minutes to install. The adhesive is SUPER sticky, but if you gently place the lock when you are lining everything up you can easily take it off and put it back on. There are also extra adhesive pads if you make any mistakes and need more. It is simple to make these open more or less if you need to, so little fingers can't fit in there. My favorite feature is turning off the locks! I keep them unlocked until my little one is wandering around the kitchen, then I an go around and lock them all in about 5 seconds to keep her safe. Wish I could give them more stars!
customer_reviews.author: Natalee

customer_reviews.title: easy to install but easy to pull off too
customer_reviews.text: These come undone pretty easily. If you have a toddler that is easily discouraged then great. If you have a toddler that likes to really test the abilities of somethings strength then this is not the item for you. Three good tugs and my kids had stuff scattered everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Works good & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to install and work well. We have a cat that likes to mess with the cabinet doors and these put an end to that! And we also have a baby that will be getting into things in a few months so it will be perfect for that also. We so far have only used them in the kitchen, so we put the magnet opener on the fridge instead of sticking it to a wall or something, and it works well like that. And it's nice that any (strong enough) magnet will open it, so if we ever were to loose the one they gave us it wouldn't be a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Safety First
customer_reviews.text: We love these locks because they help us keep our 12 month old safe as he explores our house and especially the cabinets. As cabinet exploring became a new thing we knew we'd need some locks. Some friends gave us other brands to try that just didn't work well with our cabinets. We remembered our church using these magnet locks in some of the children's connect group rooms and it has been a great solution for keeping our sweet little explorer safe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea - but falls short of what it promises
customer_reviews.text: I needed baby locks - my twins get into everything. I have four cabinets I wanted to secure, two in the kitchen, and two in two separate bathrooms. The cabinets are secure now and the babies can't get in, bit the key needed to open up the locks is annoying. Since I have the locks in different rooms and only one key, I have to put a lot if efort in getting anything open.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Love/Hate Relationship
customer_reviews.text: They are finicky to get the cabinet to open and re-lock, but do the job. One lock gives us more trouble that the others. The tab does not want to stay up to lock back. They are great at keeping baby out, but not the best option if you need to access what’s in the cabinets on a regular basis. Perhaps practice makes perfect. I do prefer how these installed compared to other brands we’ve tried, there is no gap for baby to get his fingers in, the doors are locked flush to the cabinet. So they are a love/hate relationship :-)
customer_reviews.author: iPhone user

customer_reviews.title: The mechanism that keeps the lock engaged is cheaply made and easily gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: The problem I have with these is they kind of quit working. The mechanism that keeps the lock engaged is cheaply made and easily gets stuck. Either it quits working completely, or you have to sort of shake the door / bang on it to get it to re-engage. It "pops up" so that it will catch on the mounting piece. I've also found the stickiness of the adhesive isn't that great. It's not terrible, but I've had to replace two of them already (they give you an extra and I had an extra box too). I feel like the concept is great, but was cheaply executed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R Turner

customer_reviews.title: Strong adhesive, easy to install, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these locks to baby proof our kitchen and these have worked very well. Installation is easy with the excellent installation tool provided. The 3M adhesive is strong and holds up to a persistent baby. They are easy to unlock with the supplied magnet tool and the locks can be disabled if you need to keep going in and out of a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: A. DANGELO

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Customer service is so great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product great locks. Work wonderful my cabinets also worked on my lazy Susan and pantry cabinets. Customer service was wonderful emailing me to make sure everything was satisfactory. These locks for the best out there!! Update. I did have trouble with one of my locks. I contacted customer service. They automatically set me out a free replacement with no charge and no request to return broken lock. They sent me out THREE new for the inconvenience. Amazing customer service absolutely amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Malissa R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 boxes of these. I love that you don't have to screw into our wooden cabinets, but the 3M sticker only holds for so long. We've had our on for over 6 months now and half of them have fallen off (I applied them as instructed to a clean surface and let the cure over night). I even have one latch that is broken. At this point, I don't feel like it's a durable product. I really wanted to like these
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: Jambini Magnetic Cabinet Locks - Baby Cabinet Safety Latches - Baby Proofing Cabinet Locks (4 Locks + 1 Key)
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:4First choice in contemporary child safety locks. Aesthetically appealing, invisible magnetic locks. Strong magnetic design. No tools needed for installation. Quickly installed using 3m adhesive tape. Keep children safe without giving up home appeal. These adhesive mounted locks are designed to keep toddlers and young children out of cabinets, while still allowing you easy access to the items in your cabinets. The locks and latches are mounted inside of the cabinet, which is more aesthetically appealing than external hardware. The tight design means little fingers cannot squeeze in between and get hurt. Locks can be disengaged, using the convenient flip switch, during periods of necessary longer access. You don't need tools, as the 3m adhesive tape tightly secures the magnets in place, on the inside of cabinets. Latch and lock mounts inside the cabinet. Strong magnets designed to prevent toddler from opening. Flip switch to disengage when the child is not present. These locks are designed with safety being the priority. In addition, if you are not completely satisfied with the product we will refund your purchase within 30 days of purchase date. We are sure that you will find these locks to be high quality and the best design on the market. Don't wait any longer to protect your child (Ren). Order your magnetic child safety locks today! Don't forget the kitchen, bathrooms, and laundry room.
feature_bullets: WHAT CUSTOMER SAY - "These locks are great! So easy to install for child proof cabinets! Love that I don't have to drill into my cabinets yet can have the security I need that my baby will not get into things she shouldn't."

NO DRILLING NEEDED - Gone are the days of drilling into cabinets, with 3M adhesive tape, the installation for each lock takes less than a minute, and requires no tools, eliminating the need for a handyman or even a drill.
COMPLETELY INVISIBLE - Imagine a child lock that's completely concealed from everyone, including toddlers - making your home more appealing, while also providing ideal child protection.
PEACE OF MIND - Rest assured that the dangers within your cabinets are off-limits to children, allowing you to have peace of mind while your children explore your home.
WORKS ON ALL CABINETS - Discover that with our innovative lock design, you can rest assured that these locks fit any cabinets style, providing a hassle free purchase

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,759 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
